text: Fernando Cavallini (15 February 1893 - 4 February 1976) was an Italian fencer. He competed in the individual foil and team sabre events at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1893 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Italian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Italy Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Livorno
title: Fernando Cavallini (fencer)
